EXTRACTED VALUE: Rainbow Six: Vegas 2 doesn’t strive to reinvent the franchise, and works mostly as a means of finishing off the story that began in the first game.
The campaign is the most intense ten hours I’ve ever had the pleasure of experiencing in videogame. Online the game has been vastly improved.
Ninja Gaiden II is not perfect but it's one of the best action games since the original and an absolute joy to play.
